---
title: "Root zone water supply"
output: html_document
date: "2022-12-07"
---

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

calc_supply <- function(x){
  # yy <- 1 - exp(-0.05 * x)
  yy <- 1 - 1/x
  return(yy)
}

ggplot() +
  geom_function(fun = calc_supply) +
  xlim(0001, 300) +
  # geom_vline(xintercept = 1, linetype = "dotted") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "dotted")

```
